mapper.select: select num, no, division, title, creatDate, hits, noticeId, noitcePwd, parNo, depth, seq from ( select notice_no no, notice_division division, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits, notice_id noticeId, notice_pwd noitcePwd, notice_par_no parNo, notice_depth depth, notice_seq_no seq, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by notice_par_no desc,notice_seq_no) numno, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by notice_par_no ,notice_seq_no ) num from cinemabox_notice where notice_title like '%${searchWord}%' order by parNo desc, seq ) where numno between ${startPage} and ${endPage}
select ceil(count(*)/5) from cinemabox_notice where notice_title like '%${searchWord}%'
select notice_no no, notice_division division, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits from(select * from cinemabox_notice order by notice_date desc) where ROWNUM <= 4

select * from (select notice_no no, notice_content content, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits, LEAD(notice_no)over(order by notice_no desc) as preNo, LEAD(notice_title)over(order by notice_no desc) as preTitle, LAG(notice_no)over(order by notice_no desc) as nextNo, LAG(notice_title)over(order by notice_no desc) as nextTitle, notice_par_no as parNo, notice_seq_no as seq, notice_depth as depth from cinemabox_notice )A where A. no= #{no}

select notice_no no, notice_content content, notice_title title, notice_date creatDate, notice_hits hits, notice_id noticeId, notice_pwd noitcePwd from cinemabox_notice where notice_no = #{no} and notice_pwd = #{noitcePwd}
mapper.insert: insert into cinemabox_notice (notice_no, notice_division, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_id, notice_pwd, notice_par_no) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{division}, #{title}, #{content}, sysDate, #{noticeId}, #{noitcePwd}, notice_seq.nextval)

insert into cinemabox_notice (notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_id, notice_pwd, notice_par_no, notice_depth, notice_seq_no ) values (notice_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, sysDate, #{noticeId}, #{noitcePwd}, #{parNo}, #{depth}+1, #{seq})
mapper.update: update cinemabox_notice set notice_seq_no = notice_seq_no + 1 where notice_depth != 0 and notice_par_no = #{parNo} and notice_seq_no > (#{seq}-1)
update cinemabox_notice set notice_hits = notice_hits + 1 where notice_no = #{no}
update cinemabox_notice set notice_content = #{content}, notice_title = #{title}, notice_id = #{noticeId}, notice_pwd = #{noitcePwd} where notice_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cinemabox_notice where notice_pwd = #{noitcePwd} and notice_no = #{no}
